prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: I just sent a message to Stefan, how will it affect him, will he respond, and if so, what will the nature and content of his response be?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical listing of the relevant chart data using horary principles for your query:

1. Planets and Their Positions
 • Sun in Aquarius at 15°7′
 • Moon in Aries at 23°49′
 • Mercury in Aquarius at 10°56′
 • Venus in Pisces at 29°32′
 • Mars in Cancer at 19°42′ (retrograde)
 • Jupiter in Gemini at 11°16′ (retrograde)
 • Saturn in Pisces at 17°43′
 • Uranus in Taurus at 23°16′
 • Neptune in Pisces at 28°2′
 • Pluto in Aquarius at 2°8′
 • North Node in Pisces at 29°42′ (retrograde)
 • Chiron in Aries at 19°35′

2. Key Chart Angles and House Cusps
 • Ascendant (representing you) in Taurus at 29°43′
 • Midheaven (MC) in Aquarius at 5°36′
 • Imum Coeli (IC) in Leo at 5°36′
 • Cross-reference for Stefan: the 9th house is taken as his sphere, which in this chart starts at 17° Capricorn and is noted as “containing Pluto” (by the provided chart data)

3. House Placements
 • 1st House (29° Taurus) – Contains Jupiter
 • 2nd House (28° Gemini)
 • 3rd House (17° Cancer) – Contains Mars
 • 4th House (5° Leo)
 • 5th House (0° Virgo)
 • 6th House (13° Libra)
 • 7th House (29° Scorpio)
 • 8th House (28° Sagittarius)
 • 9th House (17° Capricorn) – Relevant for Stefan (noted as “containing Pluto”)
 • 10th House (5° Aquarius) – Contains Sun and Mercury
 • 11th House (0° Pisces) – Contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node
 • 12th House (13° Aries) – Contains Moon, Uranus, and Chiron

4. Major Aspects
 • North Node Sextile Ascendant (orb: 0°)
 • Venus Sextile Ascendant (orb: 0°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune Sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Opposition IC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Conjunction MC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto Trine Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Moon Square Mars (orb: 4°)
 • Moon Conjunction Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Mercury Opposition IC (orb: 5°)
 • Mercury Conjunction MC (orb: 5°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 5°)
 • Ascendant Sextile IC (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Sextile IC (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Uranus Conjunction Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Ascendant Trine MC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Trine MC (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Neptune Trine IC (orb: 7°)
 • Mercury Conjunction Pluto (orb: 8°)

5. Notable Patterns and Configurations
 • Stellium in Aquarius on the Midheaven (Pluto, Mercury, Sun in Aquarius)
 • Multiple Planet Opposition involving the MC and IC (with Pluto and Mercury on the MC, and the IC in Leo)
 • Cradle pattern linking Pluto (in Aquarius), the IC (Leo), Ascendant (Taurus), North Node and Venus (both in Pisces), and the MC (Aquarius)
 • The predominance of Sextile aspects, with 13 instances noted
 • Dominant Air element among the inner planets and the Fixed modality trend

6. Additional Observations Relevant to the Query
 • Messenger Role: Mercury in Aquarius (in the 10th house alongside the Sun) is a key indicator for communication. Its aspects (trine Jupiter, conjunction with the Sun and Pluto) provide insight into the flow and reception of the message.
 • Stefan’s Sphere: The 9th house (associated with foreign or distant connections) is emphasized, with its cusp starting at 17° Capricorn and, by the chart note, “containing Pluto,” which may indicate intense or transformational influence regarding his response.
 • The overall dynamic between the Ascendant (your representation) and the 9th house (Stefan’s representation) will be integral in evaluating the outcome of your message in terms of its reception, content, and potential impact.

The above compilation represents the core data extracted from the chart that will form the foundation of a horary analysis on your query.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Your chart reveals that the energy of your message operates from a point of clear, innovative communication. Mercury in Aquarius within the 10th house indicates that your words carry an intellectual and unconventional tone, setting the stage for a response that is both candid and transformative. The stellium on the Midheaven—Sun, Mercury, and Pluto in Aquarius—imbues your message with a potent authority and suggests that the issue at hand has far-reaching implications.

In Stefan’s domain, represented by the 9th house and marked by Pluto, the influence is both intense and transformative. Pluto’s presence there suggests that your message will spark deep, possibly unexpected inner changes. It points to a response that is not superficial; instead, Stefan is likely to reveal hidden layers or underlying truths. The Mercury–Pluto connection underscores that his reply may involve a reconfiguration of his beliefs or a powerful personal insight that disrupts his prior state.

Other factors include:
• The Moon in Aries, sitting in the 12th house along with Uranus and Chiron, indicates that emotional undercurrents are active. The Moon’s square to Mars hints at potential tension or a burst of direct, perhaps even impulsive, reaction from Stefan. This may manifest in a reply that is both forthright and laced with fiercely honest emotion.
• The harmonious aspects—such as Mercury trine Jupiter and the sextiles involving the Ascendant and North Node—lend a measure of ease to the overall communication, suggesting that while his response may be intense, it will likely be clear and carry a purpose.
• Venus and Neptune in Pisces, located in the 11th house, add a dimension of empathy and transcendent understanding. Stefan’s reply might bridge intellectual acuity with emotional sensitivity, yielding insights that go beyond mere words.

In summary, your sending of the message is set to profoundly impact Stefan. A response is very likely. His communication will be charged, deep, and may act as a catalyst, disrupting old patterns and prompting transformative reflection. The content should be direct, imbued with both intense personal insight and a level of emotional candor that challenges the status quo.

This interpretation is drawn directly from the chart’s configuration and the horary principles applied here.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, madam. Are there any indicators in the chart that allude to the timing of when his response will come?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: The Moon’s position in Aries at 23°49′—a waxing crescent—indicates that the energies are in an early phase, suggesting that a response may arrive relatively promptly. Its square to Mars adds an element of sudden, impulsive, and perhaps even disruptive reaction, meaning that any reply could emerge abruptly. Mercury’s involvement in the chart, especially within the 10th house alongside the Sun and Pluto, reinforces a communication dynamic that doesn’t allow for prolonged procrastination. The overall configuration implies that Stefan’s reply may be triggered sooner rather than later, most likely within the coming few days, though the exact timing remains subject to internal influences in his domain.
